name: PainFighting
description:
This is a hilarious and lovely arcade fighting game. Cute characters drawn by pixel graphics, and 3D cartoon game scenes are produced.
Use arrow key commands to unlock skills and kills. Each of the three characters has different skills and kills, and each has a unique special skill.
You can play three characters at once and then switch between them as you go. Enemies also have a variety of ways to attack, sometimes in combination.
Enemy bosses will also have a variety of attack methods, and powerful killing skills, need to be careful to deal with. It's a bit different from the old arcade games, you can't put coins in
Clear.

Story background
In a ship a million light years away from the Earth, the Earth people immigrant city, held a pain fighting competition show convention.
Teams from every neighborhood in the city play elimination games. The winning block receives a free Current Galaxy commercial, available at the Travel Festival
Huge popularity, and lots of tourists. In order to generate good business for the tourism festival, every neighborhood has formed teams to participate in pain fighting competitions.
The three main characters, Hyakka, Jihana sisters, and Du Xiaotong, an overseas student from Earth, participate in the competition to revive the old shop street. Their love also changed during the match.
